title: Manager provides operational expertise without information asymmetry
description: Manager provides operational expertise without information asymmetry
content:
Scenario: Manager provides operational expertise without information asymmetry
    Given Marcus has knowledge of inventory levels, supplier costs, and operational data
    And corporate model used information asymmetry to maintain power
    When Marcus uses operational information for coordination
    Then all data Marcus sees is equally visible to workers
    And Marcus cannot hoard information to manipulate outcomes
    And workers access same dashboards, reports, and metrics
    And Marcus's value comes from synthesizing information, not controlling it
    And workplace_elohim ensures transparency of all operational data
